00061 inline Eval_Source_C_CoviMAC_Elem::Eval_Source_C_CoviMAC_Elem() {}
00062 
00063 inline double Eval_Source_C_CoviMAC_Elem::calculer_terme_source(int num_elem) const
00064 {
00065   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00066     return source_constituant(0,0)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
00067   else if (source_constituant.nb_dim()==2)
00068     return source_constituant(num_elem,0)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
00069   else
00070     return source_constituant(num_elem)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
00071 }
00072 
00073 inline void Eval_Source_C_CoviMAC_Elem::calculer_terme_source(int num_elem, DoubleVect& source) const
00074 {
00075   int size=source.size();
00076   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00077     for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00078       source(i) = source_constituant(0,i)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
00079   else
00080     for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00081       source(i) = source_constituant(num_elem,i)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
00082 }
